code: export const sendTestMail=emails=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);data.append('emails',emails);return fetch('https://portal.softcom.ua/php/sendmail.php?action=test',{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response;});};export const getMailingTime=()=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);return fetch('https://portal.softcom.ua/php/sendmail.php?action=gettime',{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response.json();}).then(result=>{return result;});};export const updateMailingTime=time=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);data.append('time',time);return fetch('https://portal.softcom.ua/php/sendmail.php?action=settime',{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response;});};
